# iosxr_netconf_agent_tty (Resource)

This resource can manage the Netconf Agent TTY configuration.

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "iosxr_netconf_agent_tty" "example" {
  throttle_process_rate   = 5000
  throttle_memory         = 300
  throttle_offload_memory = 0
  session_timeout         = 30
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `delete_mode` (String) Configure behavior when deleting/destroying the resource. Either delete the entire object (YANG container) being managed, or only delete the individual resource attributes configured explicitly and leave everything else as-is. Default value is `all`.
  - Choices: `all`, `attributes`
- `device` (String) A device name from the provider configuration.
- `session_timeout` (Number) Session timeout in minutes (1-1440)
  - Range: `1`-`1440`
- `throttle_memory` (Number) Memory usage in Mbytes (100-1024)
  - Range: `100`-`1024`
- `throttle_offload_memory` (Number) Memory offload to clients in Mbytes (0-12000)
  - Range: `0`-`12000`
- `throttle_process_rate` (Number) Process rate in tags per second (1000-30000)
  - Range: `1000`-`30000`

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The path of the object.

## Import

Import is supported using the following syntax:

The [`terraform import` command](https://developer.hashicorp.com/terraform/cli/commands/import) can be used, for example:

```shell
terraform import iosxr_netconf_agent_tty.example ""
```
